object.creator: 杨智勇
object.name: vJG_TH_ZB_XMXX_BM
object.package: [E]项目周报.[A]客户模块.[20]投行专项.[2008]项目周报

column.name: SFJR
column.describe: 是否实质性介入或进场工作

restrictions.condition:
{"statement":"(TJG_TH_ZB_XMXX.CZBM IN (SELECT ORGID FROM JGCRM.LBMEMBER WHERE ROLEID = 6 AND USERID = {1})
 AND ID NOT IN (SELECT ID FROM ECIF.TJG_TH_ZB_XMXX WHERE SSRQ <{2} OR GPRQ <{2} OR LTRQ <{2} )
AND TJG_TH_ZB_XMXX.XMLX IS NOT NULL
AND XMJD != 13)
OR {1} = 0","args":[{"expression":"$Login.User.OrgID","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"$Login.User","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1},{"expression":"ABS_SQLVALUE("select TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(trunc(sysdate,'YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD')) from dual ")","scale":0,"length":0,"type":1}],"type":0}
